author: Paloma Difford
description: Richly flavoured and yet dry – rum and subtle desiccated coconut with monastic herbal sweetness dried by aromatic fino sherry and vanilla bitters.
name: The Last Time (AKA Stop Fiddling With My Drink)
recipeIngredient: 45 ml White/gold 1-3 year old mellow light rum

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
